title: Kaoss Pad V is the first major upgrade to Korg’s touch-based effects in 13 years
full_text:
Kaoss Pad V is the first major upgrade to Korg’s touch-based effects in 13 years. The Kaoss Pad has seen many different iterations, but the mainline effect unit and sampler hasn't received an update since the launch of the KP3+ in 2013. Korg has finally given it the attention it deserves with the release of the Kaoss Pad V. Rather than a d….
Its first in the series to support multitouch for controlling two effects at once. Its first in the series to support multitouch for controlling two effects at … [+2720 chars]
